materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the Palace of the General Governor in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. The forefront of the photograph shows the vast grounds of the building. The building is created in the neoclassical colonial architecture, with tall columns lining the exterior, with a pediment at the front. There is a tower dome in the center of the building. The edges of the photograph is curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Palace of the Governor-General, Buitenzorg, Java.
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Bogor (Indonesia) Istana Bogor (Bogor, Indonesia) Colonization
